genshin:genshinwish.NAME: wish
DESCRIPTIONS: You walk into the room and see a large number of #bBlue meteors and a small number of #yGolden meteors in the sky. NL They seem to be interested in the gold coins in your hand. NL Try it with #yGold Wish, and maybe you can draw something.
#r@Ahh @ NL It's all #bBlue but you're convinced that the next time it's going to be ......
#gSucceed! NL spent a lot of gold to make a wish, and you finally caught a #yrelic. NL you looked at the deflated #ywallet, but at least the withdrawal was made.
#gSucceed! NL single draws gold, and that #yGolden meteor crosses a nice arc. NL falls in front of you. NL lucky, it didn't seem to be crooked.
You decide to leave this place. NL The meteor still hovers overhead, tempting the next traveler.
